feature_1_desc: Keep your goals front and center. Visualize your success every day with a custom dashboard.
feature_2_desc: Track budgets, expenses, and savings with clarity and precision using our finance engine.
feature_3_desc: Stay on top of your day with integrated Todo lists and daily planning tools.
feature_4_desc: Watch your wealth grow with dedicated savings logs and balance history.
feature_5_desc: Pivot and adapt with guided monthly check-ins to review your progress.
feature_6_desc: Brainstorm and track new revenue streams to boost your income.
featured_item_desc: Experience our top-rated features tailored for your success.
footer_about: CountBud is designed to help you organize your finances and your life in one beautiful, minimalistic interface.

onboarding_msg: Welcome to our platform! We are excited to have you on board. We strongly recommend you to go through the onboarding process and upgrade to a paid plan to get the most out of our platform.

testimonial_1_text: CountBud changed how I view my finances. The vision board keeps me motivated every single day!
testimonial_2_text: Finally, a budget app that understands that money is just a tool for achieving bigger life goals.
testimonial_3_text: Simple, elegant, and powerful. The monthly reflection feature is a game changer for my planning.
